title: DDoS Chart Toppers?BPS, PPS and RPS Greatest Hits
description: New to the scene, monster-sized botnet M?ris is raising some eyebrows with giant requests per second (rps) attacks as shared by Cloudflare (17.2M rps, reported August 19), Yandex (peaking at 21.8M rps on September 5), and KrebsOnSecurity (2M rps on September 9). Some commentary came in on Slashdot, The Record, and The Hacker News.
author: Tom Emmons
